newsitem.title: JAPAN: Key Dec 10-yr JGB futures set record high in Tokyo.
newsitem.headline: Key Dec 10-yr JGB futures set record high in Tokyo.

text.p: Key December Japanese government bond futures rose to 123.62 on the Tokyo Stock Exchange in Monday afternoon trading, setting an all-time high for any benchmark futures contract, traders said.
The December contract later rose to a high of 123.70.
Its previous high was 123.61 set on October 9 on the London International Financial Futures Exchange.
The rise was mostly led by the unwinding of short JGB positions and long Nikkei 225 futures which foreign speculators built last week.
